body.name: Jordan Green Clean Manual Toothbrush - Sustainable, Eco-Friendly Scandinavian Design, Soft Bristles, Mixed Colors, 4 Units
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 46 mins
FREE pickup Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 46 mins
features: DESIGNED WITH BOTH YOU AND THE ENVIRONMENT IN MIND - The Jordan Green Clean Toothbrush is made of 90% recycled materials. The handle is made using 100% recycled plastic from e.g. yoghurt, margarine and food tubs while the remaining 10 % (the bristle) is 100 % bio-based

ERGONOMIC AND EFFICIENT - The soft toothbrush is made of 100% bio-based nylon and the narrow soft brush lets you easily access hard to reach places. As opposed to other eco-friendly toothbrushes, Jordan Green Clean is ergonomic and completely neutral in taste

ECO FRIENDLY PRODUCTS - The eco friendly toothbrushes comes in eco-friendly packaging that is made entirely from recycled paper fibres. By using paper scrap creatively, it is recycled into something protective and useful. The packaging label is made by FSC-certified paper from responsibly managed forests, making the eco toothbrush a great sustainable gift

SCANDINAVIAN DESIGN - Simplicity and functionality coupled with a love for the environment, this is the philosophy of the Jordan Green Clean, designed by the famous Nordic designer Andreas Engesvik. In the design process, nothing has been left to chance, and only sustainable materials are used

AWARD WINNING - As a validation of our work, we won a sustainability award at the IdentiPlast in March 2019 because Jordan Green Clean is both sustainable, efficient and ergonomic. By using recycled material, we maintain the value of materials for as long as possible and are part of a circular economy. The toothbrush you will receive will be a random colour of either pink, blue or green

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #10,465 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #72 in Manual Toothbrushes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Created with planet and consumers in mind All materials and ingredients are carefully selected with the nature in mind and combined with a sustainable and great functionality, giving consumers the best of both worlds. We believe that we all have a common responsibility of taking care of both people and planet. Oral care without compromise We know that good oral care is an important part of keeping good health. Jordan has helped people with tailored quality products and encouragement to take care of their teeth for decades. Therefore we have developed Green Clean, a toothbrush range with extra focus on careful use of resources, without compromising on the quality of your oral care. Why reclaimed plastics? Plastic is a fantastic material – used correctly. The material allows to make safe, hygienic and functional toothbrushes. However; virgin plastic is based on non-renewable sources. Plastic that is already in the ecosystem should be reused. By using rreclaimed plastics we are using waste instead of virgin natural resources as well as reducing litter

100 % bio-based The nylon in the filaments of the bristles are made from castor-oil and are 100% bio-based. The castor oil is extracted from the castor oil plant, which is a natural and renewable resource. It can grow well on marginal lands and under a wide range of hostile conditions and will not compete with the agricultural sector that produces food and fibres. The bristles does not contain colorants. Saving the Planet By using reclaimed material, we maintain the value of materials for as long as possible, and are part of a circular economy. As such, we minimize waste and resource use, giving products and materials new lives. For instance, the toothbrush handle is made of reclaimed plastic originating from food containers, and the packaging is made of reclaimed paper fibres from paper-based products. Sustainability without compromise The paper container for the Jordan Green Clean material is made from scrap papers from paper industries and unwanted commercial boxes collected by the waste handling industries. By using this paper scrap creatively, it is salveged into something protective and useful.
Green Clean Step 1 Green Clean Units 4 3 Age Adults Babies Recycled ✓ ✓ Bristles Extra soft Extra soft Bristles Type Bio-based Bio-based

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, Eco Friendly
reviews.reviewText: These are well worth the price. Was looking for eco-friendly and have tried the wooden toothbrushes in the past. Not a fan of the wooden ones because they seem to mold easily. These toothbrushes, however, are great! They are soft and better for the environment than traditional toothbrushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Close to the Perfect Toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: This toothbrush is a pleasure to use. The full sized head is densely populated with bristles...seems to have at least twice the tufts of many of the modern overengineered brushes. I'm old-school and to me common sense says, more bristles = better cleaning. And the bristles...they're soft with the perfect firmness for me. The simple, clean Scandinavian designed handles are super comfortable to hold, without the overused soft plastic I find so unnecessary in almost every other brush. They also seem very durable. It's been over three months on my first brush, and the bristles are just starting to bend...and I brush very hard and long (both not recommended I know).I'm 76, been through more toothbrushes than most, and these are the best brushes I've ever used. Plus...the plastics and the packaging are from recycled materials, and the bristles are bio-based (derived from materials of biological origin...renewable, not petro-based).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for all the reasons
reviews.reviewText: I love the colors, handles, bristles, price... I've been looking for a brand i like to replace what we had been using, and these fit the bill - literally!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but too soft
reviews.reviewText: They seem like nice toothbrushes, but they are too soft for me, and I am a former dental assistant who only uses soft tooth brushes. They are way softer than my normal Oral B 35 flat trim brushes, which are extremely soft. I will not purchase these again, they do not clean my teeth very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Teeth feel great!
reviews.reviewText: My teeth feel so clean! So we bought these because the reviews were really good but we weren’t expecting to love these so much. My boyfriend and I had electric quip style toothbrushes from another store that we honestly hated. They were so refreshing to use after that. The bristles are soft that I feel like I can really get in there with them and my teeth feel so clean. My boyfriend has gum issues and these do not irritate his gums at all. Will repurchase again when we need new tooth brushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product. Its simple minimalist design makes it difficult for toothpaste to build up in unwanted places. Nothing fancy, just a solid well made product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The shape and bristles really make it
reviews.reviewText: The shape and how you hold the brush and the bristle feel is perfect and well thought out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Picky son; soft bristles
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toothbrush for my teenage son. He is very picky about the bristles on his toothbrush and also the handle. (I know!) The review is, he loves it. The bristles are soft, but not too soft and he likes the handle-grip. Also, there are two more toothbrushes. A win-win!

E' la seconda volta che richiedo questi spazzolini, perchè la prima volta mi sono trovato benissimo. Setole morbide, impugnatura robusta che non si piega e che si adegua bene alla mano, arriva in profondità. Molto efficace.
Liegt super in der Hand und ist angenehm an den Zähnen. Toll
Me gusta porque el mango es cómodo y la cabeza no es tan pequeña como los de otros cepillos que he tenido.Además, son bonitos y hechos con materiales reciclados, según lo que dice en la caja.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well made, very gentle, but effective. Nice long handle . Tactile and will order again !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Deze tandenborstels zijn geweldig en milieuvriendelijk.
